conclusion: Analyze velocity-time graphs to determine if displacements are the same.
Velocity-time graphs show Car A accelerates to v2 and Car B maintains v1.
To determine displacements, consider velocity profiles.
Car A's displacement is area under its velocity-time graph.
Car B's displacement is v1 multiplied by t1.
Compare areas under velocity-time graphs to determine if displacements are the same.
Both cars travel the same distance as they cover the same area under the curve.
